name: Spoon Theory V0.06 - Midterm build
description:
• Move around with WASD
  • Open task menu with T
    • Click on the checkbox next to a task to pin it
    • You can pin 5 tasks at once
  • When task is pinned, approach the highlighted object and hold down F to start doing the task
  • Press ESC to pause game
  • Approach the front door and press F to go to work
    • All work minigames are played with the mouse
  • Approach the bed and press F to go to sleep
  • Reach the monetary goal of £200 to win this prototype
